panels.title: Covid-19 Zeitreihe Deutschland

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") *0.02653223666 FROM "rki" WHERE ("Geschlecht" =~ /^$geschlecht$/ AND "Altersgruppe" =~ /^$altersgruppe$/ AND "Bundesland" = 'Berlin') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(7d) fill(null)

SELECT sum("value") FROM "rki" WHERE ("Geschlecht" =~ /^$geschlecht$/ AND "Altersgruppe" =~ /^$altersgruppe$/ AND "Bundesland" =~ /^$bundesland$/ AND "Landkreis" =~ /^$landkreis$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), "Bundesland" fill(null)
